name: Tinfoil Tim (GAM245)
description:
A collaborative game created by students at Depaul University. This is a GameMaker Studios 2 tower defense game produced over the course of about seven weeks. Play as Tinfoil Tim, the last man alive in the city of Chicago, only survivor of a deadly robot uprising. Defend yourself from the top of a dilapidated train against the robot swarm in a desperate bid to escape the city!

Designed and developed by Programmers Jared Walsh and Joe Tracy,  Artists Joseph Hanna and Gavin Roberts , and Game Designers Stepfan Thelemaque and Dalton Berry.
